name: places/ChIJ0cRO_g5ZwokRgKwE26joUxs
adrFormatAddress: 530 1st Ave., New York, NY 10016-6402, USA

originalText.text: I almost like lost my vision due to his incompetency. I told him I had floaters in my right eye that were getting worse. He brushed that off saying “It’s nothing. It will just go away.” He also ignored my question about the age related macular degeneration I was given a diagnosis of. The floaters kept getting worse so I went to a different ophthalmologist a few weeks later and was told I have a detached torn retina. Two operations later I still have very poor vision in that eye. Because the idiot doctor ignored the symptoms and did not take an image, I could have lost my sight in that eye permanently.  He’s works at Madison Avenue Opthomology in New York City.
